StaticAndDirectPublicationPlugin.nodeNotPublished: This document is not currently published
StaticAndDirectPublicationPlugin.visibilityPublic: Its visibility is public. This means that all users can view the content.
StaticAndDirectPublicationPlugin.visibilityPrivate: Its visibility is private. This means that restricted users can view the content.
